text:
Residential Tenancy (Shorter Period) Notice 2020

The Residential Tenancy Commissioner makes the following notice under section 56(8) of the Residential Tenancy Act 1997 .

1. Short title
    This notice may be cited as the Residential Tenancy (Shorter Period) Notice 2020 .

2. Commencement
    This notice takes effect on the day on which its making is notified in the Gazette.

3. Shorter period
    The period beginning on the COVID-19 emergency day and ending on 30 June 2020 is determined to be a shorter period for the purposes of section 56 of the Residential Tenancy Act 1997 .

Dated 29 June 2020.

PETER GRAHAM

Residential Tenancy Commissioner

Displayed and numbered in accordance with the Rules Publication Act 1953.

Notified in the Gazette on 30 June 2020

This notice is administered in the Department of Justice.
